publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2499.1 Dr Richard Simpson: World Suicide Prevention Day—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2499) in the name of Ian McKee, after "2002" insert "but expresses concern that four out of 23 local authorities responding to a recent freedom of information request have reported reducing funding for this programme under the new concordat, which has removed ring fencing".

S3M-2499.1 World Suicide Prevention Day (lodged on 9 September 2008) Lewis Macdonald*, David Whitton*, John Park*, James Kelly*, Jackie Baillie*, Claire Baker*, Elaine Murray*, Marlyn Glen*, Iain Gray*, Hugh O’Donnell*, George Foulkes*, Sarah Boyack*, Hugh Henry*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-2499.1 World Suicide Prevention Day (lodged on 9 September 2008) Des McNulty*, Ken Macintosh*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Robin Harper*

S3M-2499.1 Dr Richard Simpson: World Suicide Prevention Day—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2499) in the name of Ian McKee, after "2002" insert "but expresses concern that four out of 23 local authorities responding to a recent freedom of information request have reported reducing funding for this programme under the new concordat, which has removed ring fencing". Supported by: Lewis Macdonald, David Whitton, John Park, James Kelly, Jackie Baillie, Claire Baker, Elaine Murray, Marlyn Glen, Iain Gray, Hugh O’Donnell, George Foulkes, Sarah Boyack, Hugh Henry, Marilyn Livingstone, Mary Mulligan, Des McNulty, Ken Macintosh, Mr Frank McAveety, Robin Harper
